title: Licensed drivers data from the Brazilian Ministry of Transport

title: Licensed Drivers Data — drivers
text: tibble 114,492 rows 7 variables: regiao Brazilian Geographic Region uf Federative Unit - Brazilian States Acronym sexo Drivers sex faixa_etaria Drivers age group ano Year categoria_cnh Drivers license category condutores Amount drivers
